org.qbroker.net

Class RiakConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.RiakConnector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RiakMessenger

    public class RiakConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    RiakConnector connects to a Riak service and provides some basic Riak operation methods: list(), fetch(), store(), and delete().

    This is NOT MT-Safe. Therefore, you need to use multiple instances to achieve your MT-Safty goal.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

      returns IRiakObject for the key or null on failure

      boolean isConnected()

      returns an array of all bucket names

      tests Riak basic operations

      It reconnects and returns null or error message upon failure
      java.lang.String store(java.lang.String bucketName, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String data)
      returns id of the inserted doc or null on failure
      java.lang.String store(java.lang.String bucketName, java.lang.String key, java.lang.String data, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> meta)
